Quote from GM Vanah: http://forums.play.net/forums/GemStone%20IV/General%20Roleplaying/Verbs/view/1440 (1441)

The GRIMACE, GNASH, and PUCKER verbs have all been updated to be work with targets.

We've added patient, impatient, imperceptible, and somber as nod options!

~Vanah

Quote from GM Vanah: http://forums.play.net/forums/GemStone%20IV/General%20Roleplaying/Verbs/view/1446 (1447)

Dwarven grunts may now be used against targets!

Oh! Oh, can SCOFF take targets, too?! I can't tell you how many times a week I try it...

Sure! You could target players already, but now you can scoff at creature and object targets as well.

~Vanah
